channel.title: My 474 devolopment
channel.description:
well im just posting my development of the server
update logs
11/7/2008
vengeance added [IMG]http://i341.photobucket.com/albums/o391/satchimoo/veng.jpg[/img] clan chat interface added (clan chat not finished) [IMG]http://i341.photobucket.com/albums/o391/satchimoo/clan.jpg[/img] skill guide added (only one will add the rest later) [IMG]http://i341.photobucket.com/albums/o391/satchimoo/skillguide.jpg[/img] items kept on death (just interface) [IMG]http://i341.photobucket.com/albums/o391/satchimoo/kept.jpg[/img] player equipment (just interface 2 =\) [IMG]http://i341.photobucket.com/albums/o391/satchimoo/equip.jpg[/img] house options (still interface only , will fix it later) [IMG]http://i341.photobucket.com/albums/o391/satchimoo/house.jpg[/img] working npc/player combat =] [IMG]http://i341.photobucket.com/albums/o391/satchimoo/npccombat.jpg[/img] item list for any one who wants it [code] Bronze Defender - 8844 Iron Defender - 8845 Steel Defender - 8846 Black Defender - 8847 Mithril Defender - 8848 Adament Defender - 8849 Rune Defender - 8850 Black Mask(10) - 8901 Black Mask - 8921 Naval Shirts - 8952 - 8958 Tricorn Hats - 8959 - 8965 Navy Slacks - 8991 - 8997 Fancy Boots - 9005 Fighter Boots - 9006 Pharaoh's Sceptre - 9044 - 9050 Moonclan (lunar) - 9068 - 9074 Lunar - 9096 - 9104 C'Bows - 9174 - 9185 Proselyte - 9672 - 9678 Bomber Jacker - 9944 Bomber Cap - 9945 Cap and Goggles - 9946 Spiky Vambraces - 10077 - 10085 Comp Bows - 10280 - 10284 Rune H Helms - 10286 - 10294 Addy H Helms - 10296 - 10304 Black H Helms - 10306 - 10314 Bob Shirts - 10316 - 10324 Powdered Wig - 10392 Flared trowsers - 10394 Pantaloons - 10396 Sleeping Cap - 10398 Purple Sweets - 10476

item.title: My 474 devolopment
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

Well a 474 server / client is the most recent playable server we have. Unlike 317 server, (the current ones most people are using), 474 servers have updated client gameframes, real skillcape emotes, real godsword stances, and the latest usable animations, interfaces and gfx’s. It’s pretty amazing.
Heres my 474 server previews.

Read full topic

item.title: My 474 devolopment
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

This is mine.

private void interface430(int ID) { switch (ID) { case 7: myPlayer.doAnimation(4947, 0); myPlayer.doGraphics(1061, 0, 89 ); break; case 14: myPlayer.doAnimation(4410, 0); myPlayer.doGraphics(726, 0, 89 ); break; } }

And all of my Buttonhandler.java.

[code]package net.cellkyborg.server;

import net.cellkyborg.RSInstances.*;

public class ButtonHandler {

private RSPlayer myPlayer;

public ButtonHandler(Player p) {

}

public ButtonHandler(RSPlayer p) {
	myPlayer = p;
}

public void buttonPressed(int interID, int buttID) {
	switch (interID) {
	// case
            case 430:
	        interface430(buttID);
	        break;
	case 182:
		interface182(buttID);
		break;
	case 239:
		interface239(buttID);
		break;
	case 261:
		interface261(buttID);
		break;
	case 387: 
		interface387(buttID);
		break;
	default:
		break;
	}
}

private void interface182(int ID) {
	myPlayer.destroy();
}

private void interface239(int ID) {
}
private void interface261(int ID) {
	switch (ID) {
	case 0:
		if (myPlayer.isRunning) {
			myPlayer.isRunning = false;
		} else if (myPlayer.playerEnergy > 0) {
			myPlayer.isRunning = true;
		}
		myPlayer.setConfig(173, (myPlayer.isRunning) ? 1 : 0);

		break;

	case 5:
		switch (myPlayer.playerEquipment[myPlayer.playerWeapon]) {
                            case 11730:
                                myPlayer.doAnimation(7072, 0);
                                myPlayer.doGraphics(1194, 0, 0);
                                break; 
			case 11694:
				myPlayer.doAnimation(7074, 0);
				myPlayer.doGraphics(1222, 0, 0);
				break;
			case 11696:
				myPlayer.doAnimation(7073, 0);
				myPlayer.doGraphics(1223, 0, 0);
				break;
			case 11698:
				myPlayer.doAnimation(7071, 0);
				myPlayer.doGraphics(1220, 0, 0);
				break;
			case 11700:
				myPlayer.doAnimation(7070, 0);
				myPlayer.doGraphics(1221, 0, 0);
				break;			
		}
		break;
	}
}
public int tAni = 0;
    private void interface430(int ID) {
    switch (ID) {
    case 7:
    myPlayer.doAnimation(4947, 0);
    myPlayer.doGraphics(1061, 0, 89 );
    break;
    case 14:
    myPlayer.doAnimation(4410, 0);
    myPlayer.doGraphics(726, 0, 89 );
    break;
    }
    }
private void interface387(int ID) {
	switch (ID) {
		case 50:
			myPlayer.doAnimation(tAni++, 0);
			break;
		case 51:
                            myPlayer.doMask2(tAni++);
                            break;
	}
}

}[/code]
I have no idea what’s wrong

Read full topic
